channel.title: Comments on: My Application for ADE 2015
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Evan Weinberg
item.dc:creator: Evan Weinberg
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/04/17/my-application-for-ade-2015/#comment-370">dburgess2015</a>.
I've posted some code at https://github.com/emwdx/reassess - you should be able to run it as-is and get the basic idea.
To do this, you should edit reassess.py and change HOSTNAME to localhost.
At a terminal, go into the directory and run submit.py using Python3. Go to localhost/main/ and you should be able to see the functions.
I'm hoping to spend some time this summer cleaning and packaging this up a bit better so it's easier to use, so stay tuned.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to dburgess2015.

I’ve posted some code at https://github.com/emwdx/reassess – you should be able to run it as-is and get the basic idea.

To do this, you should edit reassess.py and change HOSTNAME to localhost.

At a terminal, go into the directory and run submit.py using Python3. Go to localhost/main/ and you should be able to see the functions.

I’m hoping to spend some time this summer cleaning and packaging this up a bit better so it’s easier to use, so stay tuned.

item.title: By: dburgess2015
item.dc:creator: dburgess2015
item.description: Can you share your application for individual quiz delivery? We are 1:1 macbooks at my school and it would be great to be able to do this.
item.content:encoded: Can you share your application for individual quiz delivery? We are 1:1 macbooks at my school and it would be great to be able to do this.

item.title: By: Andy "SuperFly" Rundquist
item.dc:creator: Andy "SuperFly" Rundquist
item.description: Awesome! Good luck. It's been so fun learning from you and hearing about all the cool things you do with your students in mind.
item.content:encoded: Awesome! Good luck. It’s been so fun learning from you and hearing about all the cool things you do with your students in mind.
